snippet.title: Zorya - Steam Game Festival Trailer
snippet.description:
We are glad to announce that we are participating in the Steam Game Festival: Autumn Edition that lasts from October 7th to October 13th! You’ll be able to download the Zorya demo for free, along with a list of awesome other games!

This is a unique opportunity for you to test out the game before it’s release in 2021!
